c74object.name: fl.biquad~
c74object.digest: Applies a biquad filter to the input.
c74object.description: Output is the same length as the input. Filter settings may be made either via parameters or per sample via inputs. The dynamic parameter is set to create the inputs for per sample values. Frames of per sample values are padded to length with their final value if required. Additional values are ignored. In this mode the parameter value is used if no corresponding input is provided. Thus, per sample values and parameters can be mixed. To process streams (not discrete frames) the reset parameter can be set off. This prevents the filter memories being cleared between frames.

entry.name: /dynamic [instantiation bool]
entry.description:
Creates inputs for per sample values for each of the filter parameters.
If an input is not provided the corresponding parameter value is used.

entry.name: /reset [bool]
entry.description: Determines whether filter memories are reset before processing a new frame.

objarg.name: a1
objarg.description:
This argument sets the a1 parameter:
Sets the a1 coefficient.

objarg.name: a2
objarg.description:
This argument sets the a2 parameter:
Sets the a2 coefficient.

objarg.name: b0
objarg.description:
This argument sets the b0 parameter:
Sets the b0 coefficient.

objarg.name: b1
objarg.description:
This argument sets the b1 parameter:
Sets the b1 coefficient.

objarg.name: b2
objarg.description:
This argument sets the b2 parameter:
Sets the b2 coefficient.

method.name: info
method.description:
Print info about fl.biquad~ to the max window for reference purposes. If no arguments are provided then all information is posted to the Max window. Else, a set of flags is used to select which sections of the reference to display, and whether or not the information should be provided in a shortened form.
The following flags are available:
description - display the object description.inputs - display info on inputs.outputs - display info on outputs.io - display info on both inputs and outputs.parameters - display info on the object parameters.quick - display shorten versions of any info displayed.

method.name: frame
method.description: Used internally by FrameLib's connection routines. User messages have no effect.

method.name: sync
method.description: Used internally by FrameLib's connection routines. User messages have no effect.

attribute.name: rt
attribute.description:
Sets the realtime state for fl.biquad~. When set to 0 fl.biquad~ can form part of a non-realtime network for processing in message threads, using buffer~ objects for audio IO.
More info on non-realtime processing with FrameLib can be found in Tutorial 11.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description:
Sets the context name for fl.biquad~.
More info on FrameLib contexts can be found in Tutorial 10.
